#summary How to download the plugin.

The plugin is available through Netbeans auto-update architecture. 
Use this update site URL is: http://protobuf-netbeans-plugin.googlecode.com/svn/distr/latest_stable/updates.xml the track the current version of the plugin. 

If you really need direct access to the binaries, look here: http://protobuf-netbeans-plugin.googlecode.com/svn/distr/latest_stable
